unnormalised: Employee retention is crucial, especially in competitive sectors like IT near Bangalore. We've seen a dip since 2023, impacting project timelines. Performance reviews scheduled for 10/11/2024 at 14:00 hrs need to address career growth. Think mentoring programs led by experienced managers like Mr. Sharma. Competitive compensation (including Diwali bonus!) and benefits (like enhanced medical insurance from Apollo Hospitals) are also essential. Remember the 15/08/1947 spirit of nation building! Further discussion at 09:30 hrs on 12/11/2024 is planned.
